Counter_Sign_Manager:string, Loc:string, Location:string, Org_Start_Date:string, Fix_Term_End_Date:string, Loan_Start_Date:string, Loan_End_Date:string, EEGrp:string, Employee_Group:string, Address_Line_2:string, Town:string, County:string, Postcode:string, Phone_Number:string, Annual_Leave_Start:string, Active_Status:string, Is_Charting_Officer:string, Charting_Officer_ID:string, Grade:string, Is_Sub_Group_Leader:string, Is_APO:string, Is_APOM:string, ['FTE-Primary']:string, ['FTE-Secondary']:string, ['Location-Primary']:string, ['Location-Secondary']:string,
